SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.commongoal

Class MinEqualsTilesPattern

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.commongoal.CommonGoal
it.polimi.ingsw.model.commongoal.MinEqualsTilesPattern
public class MinEqualsTilesPattern extends CommonGoal
Class to represent the goal pattern with all Tiles disposed in the following pattern on the Board. Four lines each formed by 5 tiles of maximum three different types. One line can show the same or a different combination of another line.
See Also:
  • Tile
  • Board

  • Constructor Details

    • MinEqualsTilesPattern

      public MinEqualsTilesPattern()
      Class constructor without parameters. Builds a MinEqualsTilesPattern.

    • MinEqualsTilesPattern

      public MinEqualsTilesPattern(int id, int patternRepetition, CheckType type, Direction direction, int maxEqualsTiles)
      Class constructor with parameters. Builds an MinEqualsTilesPattern with a specified type, ID, ...
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier assigned to the commonGoal card.
      patternRepetition - contains the number of times the personal goal must be completed to take the score tile.
      type - the type of check that has to be done on the considered common goal's card.
      direction - contains the directions that can be used in this pattern.
      maxEqualsTiles - contains the maximum number of tiles that can be the same in a column/row.

    • MinEqualsTilesPattern

      public MinEqualsTilesPattern(int id, int numberOfPatternRepetitionsRequired, CheckType type, int numberOfPlayers, Direction direction, int maxEqualsTiles)
      Class constructor with parameters. Builds an MinEqualsTilesPattern with a specified type, ID, ... (numberOfPlayers is also considered in this version).
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier assigned to the commonGoal card.
      numberOfPatternRepetitionsRequired - contains the number of times the personal goal must be completed to take the score tile.
      type - the type of check that has to be done on the considered common goal's card.
      numberOfPlayers - number of active players.
      direction - contains the directions that can be used in this pattern.
      maxEqualsTiles - contains the maximum number of tiles that can be the same in a column/row.

    • MinEqualsTilesPattern

      public MinEqualsTilesPattern(int id, int numberOfPatternRepetitionsRequired, CheckType type, List<ScoreTile> scoreTiles, Direction direction, int maxEqualsTiles)
      Class constructor with parameters. Builds an MinEqualsTilesPattern with a specified type, ID, ...
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier assigned to the commonGoal card.
      numberOfPatternRepetitionsRequired - contains the number of times the personal goal must be completed to take the score tile.
      type - the type of check that has to be done on the considered common goal's card.
      scoreTiles - number of active players.
      direction - contains the directions that can be used in this pattern.
      maxEqualsTiles - contains the maximum number of tiles that can be the same in a column/row.
